Futuro Kings FC was an Equatorial Guinean football club based in the city of Mongomo. It played in the Liga Nacional de FÃºtbol. The club was founded in 2017 as a result of the merger between Malabo Kings BC (a basketball team) and Estrellas de Futuro de Mongomo (a football team).
